其中旅游票(Excursion Fare)是比较常见的个人票，限制并不多，特别需要注意的是在「停留时间」，也就是说玩家在购买这类特别票 …
高级日常英语 - 豆丁网 ... through train( 直达快车), excursion train( 游览列车), sleeper with couchettes( 双层卧铺车) •.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin excurs- 'digressed, run out' (from the verb excurrere) + -ive, perhaps influenced by discursive

means.word_mean: 1. (of e.g. speech and writing) tending to depart from the main point or cover a wide range of subjects;

sentences.sentence: "amusingly digressive with satirical thrusts at women's fashions among other things"
"a rambling speech about this and that"

stems_affixes.word_buile: curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→像跑一样的[书写]
curs跑,发生,快速做……+ory……的→快速做完→粗略的
ex出+curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→思想跑出去→离题的
in进入+curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→跑进来的→侵入的
curs跑,发生,快速做……+or表名词→移动,跑得快→光标,指针

in进入+curs跑+ion动作或状态→跑入→侵犯
pre预先+curs跑,发生,快速做……+or人→先跑者→先驱
